author: T5635RVmariaf
title: My experience
text: We were there for the Dupree Dance Project. During your survey I've already typed out my problems with our stay at your hotel. Our breakfast order came too late to eat it and we were told there would be no charge. My checkout reflected $377.18 but you charged my Discover Card $428, I'm challenging that.
